file.name: spec.v1.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: "1.0"
  title: Sunnah.com API
  description: >-
    Sunnah.com API offers access to verified data of collections of hadith of
    the Prophet (SAWS). Here you will find a list of the available endpoints in
    our REST API.


    You will need an API key to access this data, which you may request by creating an
    issue on our GitHub repo. [Create an issue](https://github.com/sunnah-com/api/issues/new?template=request-for-api-access.md&title=Request+for+API+access%3A+[Your+Name])
  contact:
    name: Sunnah.com
    url: https://sunnah.com/contact
security:
  - APIKey: []
paths:
  /collections:
    get:
      summary: Get the list of collections
      description: ""
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Paginated list of available collections
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                allOf:
                  - properties:
                      data:
                        type: array
                        items:
                          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Collection"
                  - $ref: "#/components/schemas/PaginatedResponse"
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/limit"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/page"
  "/collections/{collectionName}":
    get:
      summary: Get a collection by name
      description: ""
      responses:
        "200":
          description: A collection
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Collection"
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: collectionName
          description: Name of the collection
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
  "/collections/{collectionName}/books":
    get:
      summary: Get the list of books for a collection
      description: ""
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Paginated list of available books of a collection
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                allOf:
                  - properties:
                      data:
                        type: array
                        items:
                          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Book"
                  - $ref: "#/components/schemas/PaginatedResponse"
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: collectionName
          description: Name of the collection
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/limit"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/page"
  "/collections/{collectionName}/books/{bookNumber}":
    get:
      summary: Get a book of a collection
      description: ""
      responses:
        "200":
          description: A book of a collection
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Book"
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: collectionName
          description: Name of the collection
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: bookNumber
          description: Number of the book
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
  "/collections/{collectionName}/books/{bookNumber}/chapters":
    get:
      summary: Get the list of chapters of a book for a collection
      description: ""
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Paginated list of chapters of a book of a collection
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                allOf:
                  - properties:
                      data:
                        type: array
                        items:
                          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Chapter"
                  - $ref: "#/components/schemas/PaginatedResponse"
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: collectionName
          description: Name of the collection
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: bookNumber
          description: Number of the book
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/limit"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/page"
  "/collections/{collectionName}/books/{bookNumber}/chapters/{chapterId}":
    get:
      summary: Get a chapter of a book for a collection
      description: ""
      responses:
        "200":
          description: A chapter of a book for a collection
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Chapter"
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: collectionName
          description: Name of the collection
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: bookNumber
          description: Number of the book
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: chapterId
          description: Number of the book
          required: true
          schema:
            type: number
            format: float
  "/collections/{collectionName}/books/{bookNumber}/hadiths":
    get:
      summary: Get the list of hadith of a book for a collection
      description: ""
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Paginated list of hadiths of a book of a collection
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                allOf:
                  - properties:
                      data:
                        type: array
                        items:
                          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Hadith"
                  - $ref: "#/components/schemas/PaginatedResponse"
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: collectionName
          description: Name of the collection
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: bookNumber
          description: Number of the book
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/limit"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/page"
  "/collections/{collectionName}/hadiths/{hadithNumber}":
    get:
      summary: Get a hadith of a collection
      description: ""
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Hadith of a book of a collection
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Hadith"
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: collectionName
          description: Name of the collection
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: hadithNumber
          description: Number of the hadith
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
  /hadiths:
    get:
      summary: Get a list of hadiths
      description: ""
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Paginated list of hadiths
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                allOf:
                  - properties:
                      data:
                        type: array
                        items:
                          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Hadith"
                  - $ref: "#/components/schemas/PaginatedResponse"
      parameters:
        - in: query
          name: collection
          description: Name of the collection
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: bookNumber
          description: Number of the book
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: chapterId
          description: ID of the chapter
          schema:
            type: number
            format: float
        - in: query
          name: hadithNumber
          description: Hadith number
          schema:
            type: string
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/limit"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/page"
  "/hadiths/{urn}":
    get:
      summary: Get a hadith by its URN
      description: ""
      responses:
        "200":
          description: A hadith
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Hadith"
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: urn
          required: true
          description: English or Arabic URN
          schema:
            type: integer
  /hadiths/random:
    get:
      summary: Get a randomly selected hadith
      description: ""
      responses:
        "200":
          description: A randomly selected hadith
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Hadith"
servers:
  - url: https://api.sunnah.com/v1/
components:
  parameters:
    limit:
      in: query
      name: limit
      description: Maximum number of items
      required: false
      schema:
        type: integer
        maximum: 100
        default: 50
    page:
      in: query
      name: page
      description: Offset for pagination
      required: false
      schema:
        type: integer
        default: 1
  securitySchemes:
    APIKey:
      name: X-API-Key
      type: apiKey
      in: header
  schemas:
    PaginatedResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        total:
          type: integer
          description: Total number of results matching the dataset
        limit:
          type: integer
          description: Maximum number of results in the current dataset
        previous:
          type: integer
          nullable: true
          description: Number of the previous page
        next:
          type: integer
          nullable: true
          description: Number of the next page
    Hadith:
      type: object
      properties:
        collection:
          type: string
          description: Name of the collection
        bookNumber:
          type: string
          description: The number of the book this hadith belongs to
        chapterId:
          type: string
          description: The ID of the chapter this hadith belongs to
        hadithNumber:
          type: string
        hadith:
          type: array
          description: Language specific data of the hadith
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
              lang:
                type: string
              chapterNumber:
                type: string
              chapterTitle:
                type: string
              urn:
                type: integer
              body:
                type: string
              grades:
                type: array
                description: Hadith grade information
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    graded_by:
                      type: string
                    grade:
                      type: string
    Chapter:
      properties:
        bookNumber:
          type: string
          description: The number of the book this chapter belongs to
        chapterId:
          type: string
          description: The ID of the chapter
        chapter:
          type: array
          description: Language specific data of the chapter
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
              lang:
                type: string
              chapterNumber:
                type: string
              chapterTitle:
                type: string
              intro:
                type: string
                nullable: true
              ending:
                type: string
                nullable: true
    Book:
      properties:
        bookNumber:
          type: string
          description: Number of the book
        book:
          type: array
          description: Language specific data of the book
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
              lang:
                type: string
              name:
                type: string
        hadithStartNumber:
          type: integer
          description: The first hadith number that is available in this book
        hadithEndNumber:
          type: integer
          description: The last hadith number that is available in this book
        numberOfHadith:
          type: integer
          description: Total number of available hadith in this book
    Collection:
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
          description: Name of the collection
        hasBooks:
          type: boolean
          description: Whether the collection has books or not
        hasChapters:
          type: boolean
          description: Whether the collection has chapters or not
        collection:
          type: array
          description: Language specific data of the collection
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
              lang:
                type: string
              title:
                type: string
              shortIntro:
                type: string
        totalHadith:
          type: integer
          description: Total number of hadith in the collection
        totalAvailableHadith:
          type: integer
          description: Total number of available hadith in the collection
